entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14 except minus 19 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 except minus 19 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%

Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
